thread.title: Ronnie Stewart
thread.title_full: DHgate 的点评人 Ronnie Stewart

author: Ronnie Stewart
title: Ronnie Stewart
text:
I PURCHASED 5 Microphone Cords and only one was there when i got it in the mail. I sent text to the seller but he never RESPOND TO MY REQUEST
TO fill my order I was very let down with DH GATE, But i still had my BASS
player to Purchase a Bass from you his name is HENRY WILLIAMS, I have Purchased 2 GUITARS FROM YOU.and Ia'm very happy with them. this order is my 3rd Guitar Order I still would
love to get my other 4 Microphone Cords The person I Purchased the cords from his,
was name Mr LI # 208 no.5second street, Fuqian Tianzhu Village,BEIJING CITY, CHINA/ USPS TRACKING # LT134320721CN
THANK YOU PLEASE TRY AND GET THE REST OF MY ORDER.
